mapper.select: select a.id AS id, a.shop_id AS shopId, a.title AS title, a.start_date AS startDate, a.end_date AS endDate, a.entry_type AS entryType, a.status AS status, b.name AS name, b.is_chain AS isChain, b.cate AS cate from shop_conf_lottery_basic a left join shop b on a.shop_id = b.id order by field(a.status,'NEW','ON','OFF','DEl') ,a.shop_id
select COUNT(*) from shop_conf_lottery_basic a left join shop b on a.shop_id = b.id

select count(*) from lottery_user_prize_record a left join shop_conf_lottery_prize b on a.prize_id = b.id where a.lottery_id=#{id} AND b.prize_type in
#{item}

SELECT count(*) FROM lottery_user_prize_record a left join user_stock_coupon b on a.stock_id = b.stock_id WHERE b.status in ('LOCKED','PICKED') AND a.prize_id in (select id from shop_conf_lottery_prize where lottery_id = #{0} AND prize_type = 'COUPON') AND a.lottery_id = #{0}

SELECT count(*) as expired FROM lottery_user_prize_record a left join user_stock b on a.stock_id = b.id WHERE b.status = 'EXPIRED' AND a.prize_id in (select id from shop_conf_lottery_prize where lottery_id = #{0} AND prize_type = 'COUPON') AND a.lottery_id = #{0}
